description:
Fastest growing health & fitness title in the UK – Women’s Fitness is the ultimate fitness title for the modern, busy woman 

Every issue of Women’s Fitness offers realistic, sensible advice for real women. Packed with easy but effective exercise plans, diet and motivation workouts, training tips, recipes, product reviews and handy tips on how to achieve a healthier figure not to mention celebrity fitness interviews and tips from leading health & fitness experts. 

Women’s Fitness steers away from fad diets and gives coverage to responsible nutrition products and fitness kits. Dedicated Editorial sections including: 
Exercise 
Health 
Nutrition 
Beauty 

Women’s Fitness magazine is the ultimate fitness title for the modern, busy woman who wants to look and feel her best without spending hours in the gym. It is the ideal training companion for busy career women or hectic mothers juggling the work/life balance eager to incorporate some form of exercise and a healthy lifestyle into their daily 
schedules. Ideal for all ages and fitness levels, it features workouts, training tips, celebrity fitness secrets and nutrition advice for women who want to make the most of their limited time for exercise. Quite simply, if you’re a modern woman who cares about your figure, you can’t afford to be without it! 

Passionate about leading a healthy lifestyle? – Then Women’s fitness is a must read.
